case.title: Abuse & Pamper - 25
case.text:
Hey, hey
I'm 25, 5'7, half white& half black, pretty face, small waist, thick thighs, cool hair;)
Educated, independent, well traveled, have a cool job, cool friends and my own apt I'm NYC yay:)
... Have a submissive side that I'd like to explore. Daddy stuff..
Want to have an ongoing role play thing. Looking for someone who wants to abuse and then pamper their little girl. (Def wrong and a little weird if this were real life but it's all just fantasy;) )
